api_list.name: Meta
api_list.description: Requests related to meta information regarding the Jikan REST Instance. Such as the most requested endpoints for a specific period, or just status on the REST API.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: anime, manga, character, person, search, top, schedule, season

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jikan1.p.rapidapi.com/meta/requests/anime/today"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jikan1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://jikan1.p.rapidapi.com/meta/{request}/{type}/{period}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jikan1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Top
api_list.description: Top items on MyAnimeList Note: subtype returns a filtered top list of a type type item. For example, the top Anime (type) movies (subtype) Note 2: subtype is only for anime and manga types. Note 3: Date properties are returned in string as they only consist of the month and year - which is not appropriate for ISO8601
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jikan1.p.rapidapi.com/top/anime/1/upcoming"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jikan1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://jikan1.p.rapidapi.com/top/{type}/{page}/{subtype}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jikan1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search results for the query NOTE: MyAnimeList only processes queries with a minimum of 3 letters. However, the search function can be used without q! Check examples below for more details.

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description: Anime or Manga Status, see details

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Anime or Manga Types, see details

optional_parameters.name: genre
optional_parameters.description: See API Details for list of genres

api_list.name: Schedule
api_list.description: Anime schedule of the week or specified day

required_parameters.name: day
required_parameters.description: monday tuesday wednesday thursday friday saturday sunday, other (v3), unknown (v3)

api_list.name: User
api_list.description: User related data Note: About is returned in HTML as MyAnimeList allows custom "about" sections for users that can consist of images, formatting, etc. Note 2: Anime & Manga Lists are paginated. Only 300 items are returned per page.

required_parameters.name: request
required_parameters.description: Request: profile, history, friends, animelist, mangalist

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Return items in your list matching the string
